dtliExcerpt: The show is a cheerful mess, but it's an endearing mess, and it has enough genuine charm to make you forgive its shortcomings.
bwwExcerpt: Amid all the bright lights, loud sound and frenetic staging—at one point, Guarini swings from a chandelier—the musical’s most powerful weapon is its least effortful one: musical-comedy genius Jennifer Simard’s thoroughly original spin on Cinderella’s devious stepmother....
